document_data.name: Lorin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lorin''' was an [[elf]] man who became trapped within the lair of the [[hag]] Auntie [[Ethel]], some time during or before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I see. I see what's to come. Me. Dead. Dead. See truth. See death.|Lorin.}}
document_data.Personality: The unfortunate man was afflicted with seeing horrific illusions. From his perspective, he saw truth where others only saw lies. In actuality, he was forced to witness his own death, seemingly at all times.
document_data.Relationships: He was both a husband and a father.
document_data.History: At some point in his life, Lorin was presented with two paths he could take. He approached Auntie Ethel at her home and requested the power to see his own fate. The hag granted his wish, but with a distinct twist: Lorin was filled with visions of his own death. He remained trapped in the bowels beneath the [[Gnarled Teahouse]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
